name: NSPrintPanelAccessorizing
desc: A set of methods that a Print panel object can use to get information from a printing accessory controller.

items.name: func localizedSummaryItems() -> [[NSPrintPanel.AccessorySummaryKey : String]]
items.desc: Returns an array of dictionaries containing the localized user setting summary strings.

items.name: func keyPathsForValuesAffectingPreview() -> Set<String>
items.desc: Returns a set of strings identifying the key paths for any properties that might affect the built-in print preview.

items.name: struct NSPrintPanel.AccessorySummaryKey
items.desc: Constants that specify the accessory panel keys.
